explanation: The page provides information on AI-Tax, a tax declaration software for individuals in the canton of Appenzell Innerrhoden.
The page informs users about the need to update the AI-Tax 2022 software due to a system change in June.
The page serves as a hub for various topics related to AI-Tax software, including updates and support.

The page provides information about Dibiost, a digital library service, and how to use the Onleihe app for borrowing electronic media.
